text: walaqad 'anzalna bani 'iisrayiyl munzalana salhana mkhtarana fi bilad "alsham" w"msr", warazaqnahum alrizq alhlal altayib min khayrat al'ard almbarkt, fama akhtalafuu fi 'amr dinahum 'iilaa min baed ma ja'ahum aleilm almwjb lajtmaehm waytlafhm, wamin dhlk ma ashtamalat ealayh altawrat min al'ikhbar bnbwt muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm. 'iina rabak -ayha alrswl- yaqdi baynahum yawm alqyamt, wyafsil fima kanuu yakhtalifun fih min amrk, fydkhl almukadhibin alnaar walmuminin aljnt
